jasima.core.util.observer

接口 Notifier<SUBJECT extends Notifier<SUBJECT,MESSAGE>,MESSAGE>

  • 所有已知子接口:
    SimComponent, SimComponentContainer<SUB>
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractMultiConfExperiment, AbstractMultiExperiment, DynamicJobSource, DynamicShopExperiment, Experiment, FullFactorialExperiment, Job, JobSource, JSExample, MimacExperiment, MultipleConfigurationExperiment, MultipleReplicationExperiment, NotifierImpl, OCBAExperiment, OCBATest.TextExp, RandomFractionalExperiment, Shop, ShopExperiment, SimComponentBase, SimComponentContainerBase, SimulationExperiment, StaticJobSource, StaticShopExperiment, Test_FFE_Array_Setter.TestArrays, TestExperimentAbort.AbortingExperiment, TestExperimentExceptions.ExceptionExperiment, TestPrimitivesExperiment, WorkStation

    public interface Notifier<SUBJECT extends Notifier<SUBJECT,MESSAGE>,MESSAGE>
    Notifier inform NotifierListener about events. This implements a version of the Observer-pattern using Java Generics. Implementation can be delegated via notifierImpl().
    作者:
    Torsten Hildebrandt

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default void addListener(NotifierListener<SUBJECT,MESSAGE> l) 
      default void fire(MESSAGE msg) 
      default NotifierListener<SUBJECT,MESSAGE> getListener(int idx) 
      Notifier<SUBJECT,MESSAGE> notifierImpl() 
      default int numListener() 
      default boolean removeListener(NotifierListener<SUBJECT,MESSAGE> l)
